identity.aesthetic: Neo-Fintech: Clean surfaces, vibrant data, rounded geometry

usage_rules.headings: Use Outfit for all h1-h6. Tracking tight (-0.02em). Weight 700 or 900 for Hero.
usage_rules.body: Use Manrope for all paragraphs and UI text. Excellent for numbers.
usage_rules.numbers: Always use tabular-nums class for financial data tables.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all duration-200
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 rounded-full px-6 py-3 font-medium hover:bg-slate-50 transition-all

cards.base: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300 p-6

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-indigo-500 transition-all

charts.style: Minimalist. Hide grid lines where possible. Use custom Tooltips with rounded-xl and shadow-xl.

images.description: Abstract colorful 3D geometry for login/signup side panel
Friendly user avatar for dashboard header
Minimal abstract shapes for empty data states

assets.icons: Use lucide-react. Style: Stroke width 2px, rounded corners.

general: Do not use gradients for text.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A) instead.
All financial amounts must be formatted with commas and currency symbol (â‚¹).
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
accessibility: Ensure contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 for text.
Focus states must be clearly visible (ring-2 ring-offset-2).
Use semantic HTML (main, section, article, aside).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: npm install framer-motion recharts lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge sonner @radix-ui/react-slot
2. Configure Tailwind: Add the colors and font families from this JSON to tailwind.config.js.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar/Navbar structure.
4. Build the 'Dashboard' using a Bento Grid approach (CSS Grid).
5. Use the provided image URLs for the Auth page and Header.
6. Ensure the 'Add Expense' modal is accessible and uses the 'Outfit' font for the title.
